name: SWAPDOT
description:
You kill enemies and can join together with their dead bodies to get their powers

This is my first game jam ever.

Blue enemies can only get hit by green bullets

Red enemies can only get hit by blue bullets

Yellow enemies can only get hit by red bullets

Controls:
WASD for movement
E to join together with dead enemies
Mouse to shoot

The awesome music in the game is made by Abstraction music aka Ben Burnes here is there page https://abstractionmusic.com

I hope you enjoy playing my game
